name: Pillars
description:
Pillars is an adventure platformer where there is one simple goal: Reach the top. Run, jump, launch, and slam your way up and around the six Pillars. Enjoy the free movement of the skies and traverse a multitude of environments hand-crafted for the best platforming experience.

Features
- Fluid movement system: responsive, fun movement makes climbing an already fun experience, combined with-
- Interesting Abilities: Launch and slam in different combinations to find the best way up!
- Calm, relaxing experience
- Beautiful levels and level design
